request.name: set_available_draw_modes

description.summary: advertise optional draw modes for the window

request.description:
Inform the compositor of optional draw modes which are available for the window.
Calling this after an xdg_surface's first commit is a client error.
Required modes are implemented by all clients and are not present in this array. If set_available_draw_modes is not called, only required modes are available.

enum.name: state

description.summary: types of state on the surface

enum.description:
The different state values used on the surface. This is designed for state values like maximized, fullscreen. It is paired with the configure event to ensure that both the client and the compositor setting the state can be synchronized.
States set in this way are double-buffered. They will get applied on the next commit.
Compositors will pass a draw mode in every states array when the mode is not "CSD with optional dropshadow".

entry.name: draw_noshadow

description.summary: the surface has CSD without dropshadow

entry.description: The surface contains a CSD region which does not include a dropshadow.
